name: Tama Gone Wrong
description:
Introduction

Congratulations! You just adopted the cutest tama! It's a lot of responsibility, but you can definitely handle it. You should care for it and feed it when it's hungry. 

Controls

You can either click on things to interact with them or you can use the arrows to move the cursor and any button to interact.

Team

- Marjolaine Paz https://twitter.com/Linheha : graphics, music
- Lucien Catonnet  https://twitter.com/LucienCatonnet  : programming, sound
